Become a Member

When registering here, you are signing up for our panlist. In order to be considered an official member for Spring â€™15 at the end of the semester, you must complete the 2 requirements below. Some benefits/exclusives and recognition are made available only to official members.


Attendance Tracking

Make 50% of education meetings and speaker events each semester to obtain or maintain membership. There will likely be 2-3 meetings per month (each 45 min).

YUDI Competition

FREE ENTRY. You must register as part of a team or as an individual in the fantasy investment competition. The top three teams receive $1000 in prizes as well as a JP Morgan Shadowing Experience & Executive Dinner at The Capital Grille.


I understand the requirements of official membership and acknowledge that signing up for the panlist will send information on meetings, events, and exclusives to my email. I can drop from this panlist at any time if I am not interested in becoming an official member at the end of the semester.
